pr_title: Bump the message header version from 2 to 3

timeline.bodyText: Just want to make sure one thing. For V2 and V2, info.getLifeVersion() returns -1, right?
timeline.author: zzmao

replies.bodyText: it returns 0 here. 0 should be the lifeVersion to be persisted in the log.
replies.author: justinlin-linkedin

timeline.author: jsjtzyy

timeline.bodyText: nit: could you change ind to index?
timeline.author: jsjtzyy

replies.bodyText: we already have a member variable named "index", it's persistentIndex in the blobstore. I guess I can just name this variable to "i" if you desire.
replies.author: justinlin-linkedin

jsjtzyy

replies.bodyText: 2 is the number of bytes to store header version (it's a short). I copy this code from case above.
